# nps_workshop_tag (Resource)

The `nps_workshop_tag` resource manages tags.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "nps_workshop_tag" "dev" {
  name = "dev"
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) The name for this tag
